name: schachquartett
description: Automatically generate card game with chess clubs in Germany

scripts.build-data: mysql -u root -p db107305_18 < bin/query.sql | sed 's/	/,/g' > src/data/vereine.csv
scripts.build-img: tail -n +2 src/data/vereine.csv | sed 's/,.*$//' | xargs -n1 node bin/img.js

author: Falco Nogatz <fnogatz@gmail.com>
